The conference focuses on reduce, replace, reuse & recycle and etc. The conference topics under discussion will include are eliminating single-use plastics throughout the supply chain, reducing unnecessary plastics, improving the recyclability of products and packaging, biocomposites, sustainable materials, plastic substitutes, compostability testing, upcycling, increased use of recycled materials and etc.
